OrgName: Diamond Foods, LLC. AKA Diamond Foods, Inc. a wholly owned subsidiary of Snyder’s-Lance, Inc.
activities:
Types of Data: Diamond Foods, Inc. and its US-based affiliates may receive a number of different types of data from the EU and Switzerland, including the following: (a) data concerning employees (past and present), potential employees and/or respective family members of employees or potential employees of Diamond Foods or any of its affiliates; (b) consumers, including, but not limited to, purchasers of Diamond's or its affiliates' products and/or services, consumer research participants, consumers with inquiries about Diamond's or its affiliates' products and/or services, consumers reporting adverse event reactions to Diamond's or its affiliates' products, and consumers interacting with Diamond's or its affiliates' product and/or services promotions; (c) shareholders of Diamond and/or any of its affiliates; (d) business customers or suppliers of Diamond or any of its affiliates; and (e) consumer products industry experts, consultants and lobbyists. 

Purposes of Data Collection and Transfer: The data transferred to Diamond and/or its US-based affiliates from the EU and Switzerland may be used for a variety of purposes, including: a) (i) Carrying out a contract with the subject of the data, (ii) Providing employee benefits and services; (iii) Providing shareholder benefits and services; (iv) disseminating consumer information, conducting consumer research, handling consumer inquiries and questions, and conducting consumer promotions; (v) Providing customer or supplier benefits and services to persons associated with or employed by such customers or suppliers; and (vi) managing relationships with consumer products industry experts, consultants and lobbyists; (b) Processing to protect the vital interests of the subjects of the data; (c) Processing for compliance with a legal obligation; (d) Processing to carry out legitimate business interests of Diamond and/or any of its affiliates and/or any third party or parties to whom the data is disclosed; and/or (e) Processing for purposes consented to by the subjects of the data.
personaldata: Personal data processed by Diamond Foods includes Human Resources, Customer, Supplier, Consumer, Research, Shareholder. This includes data which may be processed electronically or manually.
recoursemech:
European Union:  For human resources data, investigation of unresolved complaints would be referred to the : EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs).  For all other data, unresolved complaints would be referred to Council of Better Business Bureaus (BBB EU Safe Harbor program)
Switzerland:  Investigation of all unresolved complaints would be referred to the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
